definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)

sentences.english: METHODS The target compound was synthesized from DMSO by three steps.
sentences.chinese: 方法以亞甲碸爲原料經過三步反應合成萊菔子素。

sentences.english: Strongly hydroxyl radical scavenging ability, and higher than VC.
sentences.chinese: 萊菔多糖還具有很強的羥自由基清除能力，強於VC。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To design a new route to prepare sulforaphane.
sentences.chinese: 目的設計新的合成路線製備萊菔子素。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Broccoli seed was the optimum material for preparing sulforaphane.
sentences.chinese: 結論青花菜種子是製備萊菔硫烷的優良原材料。

definition: Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
(bird species of China) common pheasant (Phasianus colchicus)
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
small cup for adding water to an ink stone
